Question: Ossia Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Ossia Inc.

Product: Cota Forever Magnetic Phone Charger

- Harnesses Ossia's Cota Real Wireless Power™ to wirelessly charge mobile phones in use or in motion
- Powered by Ossia’s FCC-approved Cota Real Wireless Power™
- Lightweight, rectangular device, half-a-deck of cards in size
- Ready out of the box to attach to the back of a Qi2 or MagSafe device
- Named a CES 2024 Innovation Awards winner
- Receives power from a Cota transmitter, initiating connection with a beacon signal
- Cota technology enables efficient and wire-free, powered-up world
- Demonstrated at CES 2024 alongside other Cota-enabled devices
- Cota-enabled products available through Ossia and partners
Summary_cn:
欧士亚公司

产品：Cota Forever磁力手机充电器

- 利用欧士亚的Cota真无线电源™，实现对正在使用或移动的手机进行无线充电
- 由欧士亚经过FCC批准的Cota真无线电源™供电
- 轻巧的矩形设备，大小与半副牌相当
- 开箱即用，可附着在Qi2或MagSafe设备的背面
- 荣获CES 2024创新奖
- 通过Cota发射器接收电力，并通过信标信号建立连接
- Cota技术实现高效无线供电的世界
- 与其他Cota启用设备一同在CES 2024展示
- 通过欧士亚及合作伙伴提供Cota启用产品
